posts.post_title: For sale: T204 Ramly Ed Cicolte (Cicotte) PSA 3....Lowered...
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Mark T
Very, very tough card from the T204 Ramly set....out of 21 cards graded by both SGC/PSA there is nothing higher than a PSA 5...SGC has 5 cards graded a 40(3) and nothing higher. This card has NO creases or wrinkles. I believe the corners are the reason for the grade. Back has some light staining, overall its a beautiful card. I believe this to be one of his Rookie cards.

Email me at:   vintagecards@gmail.com


$1,150 delivered and insured by what ever way you would like to pay.
